mapper.insert: INSERT INTO empadd ( CD_EMP, NM_CHNAME, NM_ENNAME, YN_DRAWCONTRACTS, DC_MIDRETIRE, FG_WEDDING, FG_DISORDER, DA_BIRTH, STR_HOBBY, NM_SPECIAL, TY_RELIGION, ZIP_HOME, ZIP_ORGIN, ADD_ORGIN1, ADD_ORGIN2, MN_KEEPGARDEN, MN_KEEPESTATE, FG_OWNHOUSE, TEL_OFFICE1, TEL_OFFICE2, TEL_OFFICE3, TEL_EXTENS, TY_MILIT, WHY_MLTOFF, DA_MLTBEGIN, DA_MLTEND, FG_MLTTYPE, NM_MLTBRANC, STR_MLTDISCH, CD_MLTRANK ) VALUES ( #{cdEmp}, #{nmChName}, #{nmEnName}, #{ynDrawContracts}, #{dcMidRetire}, #{fgWedding}, #{fgDisorder}, #{daBirth}, #{strHobby}, #{nmSpecial}, #{tyReligion}, #{zipHome}, #{zipOrgin}, #{addOrgin1}, #{addOrgin2}, #{mnKeepGarden}, #{mnKeepEstate}, #{fgOwnHouse}, #{telOffice1}, #{telOffice2}, #{telOffice3}, #{telExtens}, #{tyMilit}, #{whyMltOff}, #{daMltBegin}, #{daMltEnd}, #{fgMltType}, #{nmMltBranc}, #{strMltDisch}, #{cdMltRank} )
mapper.update: UPDATE empadd SET CD_EMP = #{cdEmp} NM_CHNAME = #{nmChName}, NM_ENNAME = #{nmEnName}, YN_DRAWCONTRACTS = #{ynDrawContracts}, DC_MIDRETIRE = #{dcMidRetire}, FG_WEDDING = #{fgWedding}, FG_DISORDER = #{fgDisorder}, DA_BIRTH = #{daBirth}, STR_HOBBY = #{strHobby}, NM_SPECIAL = #{nmSpecial}, TY_RELIGION = #{tyReligion}, ZIP_HOME = #{zipHome}, ZIP_ORGIN = #{zipOrgin}, ADD_ORGIN1 = #{addOrgin1}, ADD_ORGIN2 = #{addOrgin2}, MN_KEEPGARDEN = #{mnKeepGarden}, MN_KEEPESTATE = #{mnKeepEstate}, FG_OWNHOUSE = #{fgOwnHouse}, TEL_OFFICE1 = #{telOffice1}, TEL_OFFICE2 = #{telOffice2}, TEL_OFFICE3 = #{telOffice3}, TEL_EXTENS = #{telExtens}, TY_MILIT = #{tyMilit}, WHY_MLTOFF = #{whyMltOff}, DA_MLTBEGIN = #{daMltBegin}, DA_MLTEND = #{daMltEnd}, FG_MLTTYPE = #{fgMltType}, NM_MLTBRANC = #{nmMltBranc}, STR_MLTDISCH = #{strMltDisch}, CD_MLTRANK = #{cdMltRank} WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}
